articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets British Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets British Ambassador
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with British Ambassador to the DPRK Karen Suzanne Wolstenholme who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Indonesian Youth and Sports Minister
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Indonesian Youth and Sports Minister
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Minister of Youth and Sports Affairs of Indonesia Andi Alifian Mallarangeng and his party who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday. 
					 The minister extended thanks to the Korean people for according warm hospitality to the delegation, adding that the friendly relations between Indonesia and the DPRK have a long tradition.
					
					 These friendly relations hinge on the young people of the two countries, he noted.
					
					I was pleased to learn that the DPRK has made many successes in the work with young people and in the field of sports, he said, reiterating his will to boost exchange and cooperation between the two countries in the fields and thus contribute to the development of the  friendly relations.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets New Kuwaiti Ambassador
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets New Kuwaiti Ambassador
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Friday met and had a talk with new Kuwaiti Ambassador to the DPRK Mohammad Saleh Al-Thuwaikh who paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: FM Censures US for Urging Myanmar to Break off Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
FM Censures US for Urging Myanmar to Break off Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Friday as regards the U.S. has pressurized Myanmar to break off relations with the DPRK:
					 The high-ranking authorities of the U.S. pressurized Myanmar to cut off the relations with the DPRK, a vicious politically-motivated provocation.
					
					 At first, it pressurized Myanmar to suspend military ties with the DPRK. Now it is openly urging the country to sever bilateral relations, calling the DPRK a "bad friend".
					
					 In May the U.S. president said that the U.S. would render more aid to Myanmar if it breaks off relations with the DPRK. The U.S. State secretary urged Myanmar to move in the direction of cutting off the relations with the DPRK whenever an opportunity presented itself. A few days ago, the assistant secretary of State for East Asian and Pacific Affairs let loose such invectives that Myanmar should move to break off the relations with the DPRK, "bad friend", at an early date.
					
					 This proves that the U.S. hostile policy to isolate and stifle the DPRK remains unchanged and has been pushed forward with increased zeal.
					
					 It is precisely for this reason that the DPRK has kept itself fully prepared to cope with the U.S. hostile policy toward it.
					
					 The U.S. which sows discord among countries, nations and tribes and harasses regional and world peace and stability is, in fact, a "bad friend" whom all the countries aspiring after independence should shun.
					
					 Anti-U.S. protests are unabated in Mid-east countries which suffer from untold misfortune and pains due to the U.S. interference, being caught in its tentacles of aggression.
					
					 The U.S. has shifted its strategic focus to the Asia-Pacific region and has fostered discord and stand-off. This resulted in fierce territorial disputes and escalation of tension in the region.
					
					 All facts teach a lesson that tragic incidents occur wherever the U.S. sets its foot.
					
					 The DPRK has ensured the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula by dint of a powerful war deterrent built by itself.
					
					 If the U.S. keeps its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK, it will meet a miserable end in the Korean Peninsula and the region.

articles.title: CPRK Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Producing Anti-DPRK Films
articles.content:
CPRK Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Producing Anti-DPRK Films
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released information bulletin No. 1011 Friday.
					 It says:
					
					 The puppet regime of south Korea put to use defectors to the south, die-hard ultra-right conservatives and reactionary moviemen to produce and put on show films slandering the DPRK's human rights performance as part of its smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 Under the manipulation of the regime, the riff-raffs of the "Network for Democracy of North Korea", an anti-DPRK plot-breeding organization, held the "second film festival on the human rights performance of north" in Seoul shortly ago. They put on the screen nine films dealing with the "life of defectors from the north" and "state of concentration camps", malignantly slandering the human rights performance in the DPRK. 
					
					 The "People for Making Successful Unification", another anti-DPRK human rights organization, held the special preview of "48M" allegedly produced by a defector to the south in the presence of ambassadors and envoys of various countries and members of NGOs at the UN Commissions on Human Rights in Geneva on Sept. 14.
					
					 The organization also held a meeting to hear "testimonies." 
					
					 The puppet regime also showed those films at U.S. Congress and in European countries and presented them even to international film festivals in alignment with the human rights plotters of the U.S. and Europe.
					
					 The puppet regime's ever-more undisguised anti-DPRK human rights campaign is another traitorous and anti-reunification frenzy to hurt the daily increasing dignity of the DPRK and incite the consciousness of confrontation with fellow countrymen among the south Koreans.
					
					 The Secretariat strongly denounces the puppet regime's anti-DPRK farce as a blatant challenge to the DPRK's dignity and social system and a sordid act aimed to quench the spirit for reunification through alliance with the north mounting among south Koreans of all social standings and incite confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					
					 The army and people in the DPRK are opening up the heyday of prosperity in which they will lead a happy life in the socialist society in single-minded unity under the wise guidance of the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The people are leading a genuine life under the loving care of the peerlessly great man who brings into bloom the legends of love for the people while making tireless devotion to the country and the nation. They are bringing about fresh miracles and renovation in building a great prosperous and powerful nation with hope and confidence. This is the stirring situation of the DPRK.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the puppet regime has used human scum bereft of elementary conscience and dignity for kicking up false propaganda by distorting the situation in the DPRK. It is even abusing film arts for escalating confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 Such hysterical act of the regime is a mockery and insult to the film arts which is a product of modern civilization and which is obliged to reflect justice, truth and noble human life.
					
					 The puppet regime's sordid act clearly proves to what extent its frenzy for confrontation with the DPRK has reached.
					
					 It is trying to attain its dirty criminal attempt by using human scum, who betrayed the country and the people as well as their own blood relatives for their own indolence and luxury, and the parasitic riff-raffs. This proves that the regime is also made up of the same human scum and confrontation maniacs as those defectors.
					
					 The south Korean regime is setting the stage for all kinds of dirty farces, distorting the truth in the DPRK and tarnishing its image in a bid to garner supporting votes at the upcoming "presidential election." But no one will lend an ear to it.
					
					 The regime's act only betrays its base nature, moral vulgarity and low level of civilization. It will get public censure and disillusion from it.
					
					 We will never let those involved in producing and showing anti-DPRK films, to say nothing of the south Korean authorities, go scot-free but sternly punish them in the name of the nation.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Party for Thailand led by its Deputy Leader Kanawat Wasinsungworn and a delegation of the Ulan-Ude City of Russia headed by Mayor Gennadi Aidayev arrived here on Friday. 
					 Meanwhile, the delegation of the Eurasia-Pacific Uninet led by Vice-Chairman Wolf-Dieter Rausch and the delegation of the Chinese Academy of Sciences headed by Fang Xin, vice chief of the Party Organization of the Academy, which took part in the Joint Scientific Conference of Kim Il Sung University and the Eurasia-Pacific Uninet, and the delegation of the Chinese State Administration of Radio, Film and Television led by Vice-Minister Li Wei left here on the same day.

articles.title: Thai Party Delegation Feted
articles.content:
Thai Party Delegation Feted
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea hosted a reception in honor of the visiting delegation of the Party for Thailand at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
					 Present there on invitation was the delegation led by Deputy Leader Kanawat Wasinsungworn.
					
					 Secretary Kim Yong Il and other officials concerned were present there.
					
					 Kim Yong Il said that President Kim Il Sung met friends of Thailand several times, consolidating the friendly ties between the two countries.
					
					 The two peoples formed the friendly and cooperation relations and favorably developed them on the principle of mutual respect and equality.
					
					 Kim said the DPRK would make positive efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and peoples in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 Kanawat Wasinsungworn said in his speech that he was glad to visit the DPRK, expressing thanks to the Korean people's hospitality.
					
					 The increasing exchange of high-level delegations between the two countries shows the friendly relations in political and other fields.
					
					 He expressed his willingness to continue to develop the friendly ties between the two countries.

articles.title: Indonesian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Indonesian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Minister of Youth and Sports Affairs of Indonesia Andi Alifian Mallarangeng and his party visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests looked round the historic relics there, hearing immortal stories about the house.
					
					 They toured the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 The minister said that he was deeply impressed to visit Mangyongdae. I came to know well about the revolutionary life of the President and his family members, he noted, adding: The President embarked on the road of the revolution in his early years and liberated the country. Mangyongdae is a place of great importance in educating the younger generation in the revolutionary idea.
					
					 Meanwhile, the guests also visited Kim Il Sung Stadium, Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, Ice Rink, Central Botanical Garden, etc.

articles.title: Pyongyang Autumn Int'l Trade Fair Participants Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Pyongyang Autumn Int'l Trade Fair Participants Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 8th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair Friday visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 They looked round historic relics, being briefed on the immortal revolutionary history of the President and his revolutionary and patriotic family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 The deputy director of the Liaoning Provincial Bureau of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation of China said that the President was the great leader of the Korean people and a close friend of the Chinese people. 
					
					 The Chinese people will always remember the President.
					
					 Meanwhile, the guests visited the National Gifts Exhibition House.
					
					 They were deeply impressed to look round the gifts that the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu received from Koreans in the north and the south and overseas.

articles.title: Brisk Film Interchange among Countries
articles.content:
Brisk Film Interchange among Countries
Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- A brisk film interchange was conducted at the Yanggakdo International Hotel during the 13th Pyongyang International Film Festival (Sept. 20-27), promoting exchange, collaboration and friendship among countries.
					 Visiting the venue of interchange with DPRK films and posters on display were delegations and delegates, film makers, distributors and fans from various countries which attended the film festival.
					
					 O Hyong Chol, director of the Korea Films Export and Import Corporation, told KCNA that the film festival participants showed great interest in DPRK films.
					
					 According to him, agreements were reached on a series of matters related to the export of Korean films in the course of interchange.
					
					There were wide-ranging negotiations on the collaboration for TV dramas and feature films between the DPRK side and film companies of various countries, including China.
					
					 The Korea Films Export and Import Corporation had several discussions with a German company to solve technical issues for film production.
					
					 The film interchange served as an effective lever in developing the Korean film art, the director said, hoping that the discussions would result in good fruits.

articles.title: Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute
articles.content:
Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute is an up-to-date and comprehensive vegetable research and production centre, the largest in the country.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited the Institute in March Juche 100 (2011), and it was rebuilt on an expansion basis in a short span of time according to his onsite instruction.
					
					 The total plottage of the Institute grew nearly thrice, the area of hydroponic hothouses twice, the area of vinyl sheet-roofed hothouses 6 times and the vegetable output 3.4 times as compared with last year.
					
					 The Institute has hydroponic hothouses based on computer control system, several hundred blocks of non-heating vinyl sheet-roofed hothouses, bioengineering room and other research and experimental cultivation bases.
					
					 Particularly, the hydroponic hothouses are on the world level in size and outfit.
					
					 A combined control system by way of PLC runs the nutrient solution supply system, which monitors and regulates the amount and pH of solution in real time, and the system of controlling such environmental factors as temperature, humidity and sunshine.
					
					 The bioengineering room and other research rooms are equipped with advanced equipment and technical means, including high-pressure sterilizer and ultraviolet analyzer.
					
					 The Institute specializes in vegetable research, production and sale.
					
					 Recently touring the Institute, Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, expressed great satisfaction over its size and scientific standard.
					
					 Over the last one year the Institute has made radical progress in establishing the method of producing vegetable seeds.
					
					 While positively applying advanced bio-technologies, it collected several hundred varieties of scores of kinds of vegetables and made researches into them.
					
					 In the course the Institute developed various strains of vegetables such as greenhouse round-shaped eggplant to be registered as patent and established the technique of cultivating tens of kinds of pollution-free vegetables and a new cultivation method that makes it possible to raise the per-hectare yield at vinyl sheet-roofed hothouse by more than 150 tonnes.
					
					 Its researchers also authored and disseminated various books of academic and practical value including "Practical Technology for Vegetable Cultivation".
					
					 At present the Institute is cultivating various kinds of vegetables good for health.
					
					 Ryang Min Ho, chief of the cultivation research section of the Institute, told KCNA that the Institute would soon begin to cultivate 50 odd newly-bred varieties of vegetables, including cucumber, radish and tomato.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Riles Moves of US and Japan to Tighten Military Alliance
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Riles Moves of US and Japan to Tighten Military Alliance
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Tension remains high on the Korean Peninsula and the situation has not been improved in the Asia-Pacific region entirely because the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries are keen to tighten their political and military nexus, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. president said at a recent press conference that "the U.S.-Japan alliance is a cornerstone for ensuring peace and security in the Asia-Pacific region." The U.S. secretary of Defense blustered "the U.S.-Japan alliance has been a foundation of peace and stability in the Asia-Pacific region for decades." Timed to coincide with these outbursts, the Japanese authorities including the prime minister cried out for steadily preserving the U.S.-Japan "security pact" for "stability" in the region.
					
					 Lurking behind their reckless remarks are black-hearted intentions of the U.S. and Japan to contain and stamp out the progressive forces in the region and realize their scenarios for hegemony and reinvasion.
					
					 The tightened alliance between the U.S. and Japan means beefing up their aggressor forces.
					
					 The U.S. is busy amassing huge forces in its strongholds of military and strategic importance and major areas rich in resources under the signboard of "stability" and the like.
					
					 The U.S-Japan "security pact" is aimed at perpetrating aggression and war against other countries.
					
					 The "pact" is a factor of increasing the danger of a war in the Asia-Pacific region and threatening peace and security there. Its main spearhead is directed to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and Japanese reactionaries consider it as their primary task for carrying out their Asia-Pacific strategy to keep south Korea as a nuclear outpost and contain the DPRK by using it as a springboard.  Hence, they are beefing up the U.S. forces in south Korea and reducing it into a hotbed of a war.
					
					 Peace and security can never settle in the Asia-Pacific region as long as the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries persist in their criminal moves, concludes the article.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Lee Myung Bak Regime's Provocations
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Lee Myung Bak Regime's Provocations
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities let many speedboats of the navy intrude deep into the territorial waters of the DPRK southwest of Yonphyong Island along the maritime demarcation line and fire bullets and shells at random at civilian fishing boats on Sept. 21.
					  Minju Joson Friday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:  
					
					 This provocation is touching off bitter resentment among all Koreans as it was a premeditated provocation committed according to the scenario for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 There is no one who would consider this provocation as an accidental one. 
					
					 Timed to coincide with this firing at peaceful civilian fishing boats, the south Korean warmongers let their fighters equipped with missiles make emergency sorties and massively reinforced their naval forces in the waters around their islands before putting them on emergency alert. Their madcap naval actions were aimed to escalate any armed conflict into an all-out war.
					
					 The gravity of the development was that the puppet forces deliberately intruded into territorial waters of the DPRK side to spark off an armed conflict and fired bullets and shells at fishing boats of other country.
					
					 Much upset by this incident which sparked great international uproar, the puppet forces are grumbling "the north's fishing boats trespassed on the 'northern limit line' one after another in recent days", "putting fishing boats at the head is a sort of psychological warfare" and "it is possible to lead to a local war."
					
					 With no rhetoric reminiscent of a thief crying "Stop the thief!" can they hide their bellicose nature.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is bound to meet a stern punishment from the nation as it is hell-bent on the moves for a war against the DPRK, going against the public mindset.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Successfully Concluding This Year's Drive
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Successfully Concluding This Year's Drive
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday editorially calls on all Koreans to glorify this significant year as a year of miracles and victory in the spirit that prevailed in the 1970s when the revolution was loudly sounded.
					 This is a significant year to be specially recorded in the history of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution and in the history of the drive for building a thriving nation, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 Having the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the top posts of the WPK and the state marked a historic event which brought about an epochal turn in the drive to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and achieve final victory in the building of a thriving nation. This year the DPRK splendidly greeted the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung as a grand national auspicious event amid high political enthusiasm of all service personnel and people. The celebrations of the anniversary of the Korean Children's Union, the day of victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and the Youth Day strikingly demonstrated the might of single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks in which all Koreans are united close around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people have waged a dynamic drive since the outset of the year, true to the decision of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, the joint calls of the Central Committee and Central Military Commission of the WPK and the joint editorial.
					
					 All servicepersons and people turned sorrow into thousand-fold strength and courage, fully displaying their revolutionary enthusiasm to decorate the first year of the new centenary of Juche with laudable victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. There appeared Changjon Street and Rungna People's Pleasure Park as monumental edifices in the era of Songun and modern production bases conducive to the building of an economic power and the improvement of people's living standard in different parts of the country. A large number of workers have honored their yearly plans.
					
					 It is important to successfully conclude this year's drive in order to consolidate all the achievements made so far and win greater victories. Success in the future drive for final victory in the building of a thriving nation would depend on how to conclude this year's drive.
					
					 The editorial calls on the Korean people to win shining victory in the on-going general offensive and thus demonstrate once again before the whole world the might of their single-minded unity around the great illustrious commander of Songun and their revolutionary mettle to do everything unconditionally once the Party is determined.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Proper Approach towards Joint Declarations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Proper Approach towards Joint Declarations
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- How to approach the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration is a clear yardstick showing whether one stands for reconciliation and peace or for confrontation and war, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The north-south declarations serve as a milestone of independent reunification in the new century.
					
					 The spirit of "By our nation itself" reflected in the declarations represents a noble patriotic desire as it calls on all Koreans to give full play to patriotic enthusiasm and advance hand in hand for reunification. The declarations comprehensively clarify the principle and ways to solve the issue of the country's reunification and specific matters arising in achieving it. 
					
					 In the period when the declarations were being implemented, the inter-Korean relations put an end to the history of distrust and confrontation that lasted for more than half a century and were definitely put on the orbit of reconciliation and unity.
					
					 The north and the south conducted brisk dialogue and cooperation in various fields, after boldly discarding the old conception of confrontation.
					
					 Thanks to the dynamic advance of the June 15 era of reunification, an atmosphere of peace and stability settled on the Korean Peninsula and a bright prospect of peace and reunification was opened there. This was entirely possible because the north and the south made concerted efforts to implement the said declarations, respecting them.
					
					 The declarations call on all Koreans to pool efforts in the spirit of "By our nation itself" and achieve the peaceful reunification of the country. Denying this means pursuance of the inter-Korean confrontation and a war. This is proved by what the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors has done.
					
					 The Lee group regarded it as a "principle" to oppose the declarations. This reckless stand totally blocked the way for defusing the present confrontation between the north and the south and created the worst situation on the peninsula where a war may break out any moment.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that if the declarations are respected and implemented, the inter-Korean relations will improve and peace settle but if one denies and refuses to implement the declarations, confrontation will be escalated and a war will be bound to break out.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Purchase US-made Attack Helicopters
articles.content:
S. Korea Plans to Purchase U.S.-made Gunships 
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers are mulling purchasing latest-type helicopter gunships from the U.S., according to the south Korean KBS on Thursday.
					 It is reported that the south Korean authorities asked the U.S. to sell 36 helicopters worth billions of U.S. dollars and the U.S. Department of Defense requested Congress for its approval of the sale on Sept. 26.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Apology Termed Hypocritical in S. Korea
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Apology Termed Hypocritical in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- South Koreans from all walks of life on Sept. 24 termed as hypocritical the apology made by Park Geun Hye, "presidential" candidate from the "Saenuri Party", as regards the case of the People's Revolutionary Party cooked up by the dictatorship regime of Park Chung-Hee. 
					 The bereaved families of victims of the case said it was reported that Park Geun Hye made an apology for the case, but what she said and did recently proved that her apology was not sincere. 
					
					 When her support rate was sinking, driven to a tight corner, she made an insincere apology, prompted by her ambition to become "president", they said, and went on:
					
					 Such act of deceiving the people is little short of rubbing salt into the wounds of the bereaved families. 
					
					 The Democratic Action for Eliminating Remnants of "yusin" and Justice of History said that Park's apology was nothing but an artifice to put under control the situation turning unfavorable to her.
					
					 The Society for Inheriting Spirit of the National Democratic Youths and Students League in its statement noted that if the expression of apology by the candidate from the "Saenuri Party" was sincere, the Lee Myung Bak regime should restart the work of the Committee for Settling the Past History for Truth and Reconciliation and thus positively opt for probing the truth and reinstating the victims.
					
					 Recalling that the ruling party has hamstrung a proper settlement of the past history since the days of the "Grand National Party," the organization urged the party to show its sincerity by making a switchover in such stand.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Driving Students to Death
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Driving Students to Death
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- "Huimang, community of youth and children in the 21st century" called an urgent press conference in front of the building of the south Korean "Ministry of Education, Science and Technology" on Sept. 23 to condemn the south  Korean "government" authorities for driving students to death.
					 The speakers deplored at the press conference that youth and children are committing suicides one after another after giving up their hope for learning.
					
					 The suicides are mainly attributable to the woeful educational situation in south Korean society, they charged.
					
					 The problem of suicides among young people is nothing new, they noted, denouncing the regime for having shunned it.
					
					 They urged the regime to take practical steps for enforcing proper education and putting an end to suicides.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Blasts Japanese PM's Remarks on Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Blasts Japanese PM's Remarks on Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hankuk Ilbo in an editorial on Sept. 24 lashed out at the Japanese prime minister for making such reckless remarks as evading the responsibility for the sexual slavery committed by the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The editorial denounced the prime minister for letting outbursts that Japan has no plan to make an apology or reparation for the sexual slavery, when interviewed by Wall Street Journal on Sept. 23.
					
					 What is more intolerable is that he blustered any more persistent argument about reparation for that issue would only hurt the feelings of fair-minded Japanese, it noted.
					
					 He made similar reckless remarks in August, too, it said, adding that this means a total denial of the 1993 Kono statement which officially admitted the army's involvement in the sexual slavery and the coercive manner in which it enforced. Victims of such sexual slavery enforced by the Imperial Japanese Army during the Pacific war are found in different countries of the world.
					
					 It recalled that actions in demand of Japan's apology and reparation for the crimes committed against humanity are still going on and the UN released reports holding the Japanese government responsible for the sexual slavery more than ten times.
					
					 This being a hard reality, Japan has refused to admit such crimes, it noted, urging the Japanese government to admit its responsibility for the crimes and make an apology and reparation for them as soon as possible.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo Exhibitions Open in Russia, Peru
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo Exhibitions Open in Russia, Peru
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions opened in Russia and Peru on Sept. 20 and 21 in the run-up to the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the 67th anniversary of the WPK and the 86th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Displayed in the venues of the exhibitions were photos on the brilliant revolutionary careers of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un and their undying exploits.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great men, books and photos on Songun Korea and handicrafts reflecting the wisdom and skills of the Korean people.
					
					 Personages of different social standings and people in relevant countries attended the opening ceremony.
					
					 Officials of the DPRK missions were present there on invitation.
					
					 The director of the Cultural Department of the Magadan Regional Government of Russia said the exhibition opened in Magadan City at a time when the friendly and cooperative relations between Russia and the DPRK are growing stronger would provide many Russians with an opportunity to know better about the DPRK.
					
					 The acting governor of the Magdalena del Mar District in Lima City, Peru said:
					
					 Korea boasts 5 000-year-long history and brilliant culture.
					
					 The exhibition will offer Peruvians an important opportunity to see the picture of the DPRK developing as the days go by, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un who is upholding the intentions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The governor expressed hope that the friendly ties between Peru and the DPRK would grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Given Publicity in Mexico and Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Given Publicity in Mexico and Russia
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The Mexican paper Unidad Nacional on Sept. 15 carried the full text of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us Advancing under the Uplifted Immortal Banners Bearing Portraits of Smiling Great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il".
					 The paper carried a photo of Kim Jong Un making a speech at a banquet given in celebration of August 25, 2012.
					
					 The full text of Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was posted on Internet website Mega Mir of Russia on Sept. 20.
					
					 The work, published on April 20, 2012, clarifies the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and indicates tasks for resolutely defending their idea and exploits and glorifying them for all ages.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con Karen Suzanne Wolstenholme
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con Karen Suzanne Wolstenholme
Pyongyang, 28 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio hoy en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la embajadora britanica en Corea, Karen Suzanne Wolstenholme, quien le hizo una visita de despedida.

articles.title: EE.UU. impone a Myanmar romper relaciones con la RPDC: MINREX
articles.content:
EE.UU. impone a Myanmar romper relaciones con la RPDC: MINREX
Pyongyang, 28 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo de que Estados Unidos impone a Myanmar romper las relaciones con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC respondio el dia 28 a la ACNC como sigue:
					Ultimamente, las autoridades de alto rango de EE.UU. cometen por turno la sucia provocacion politica de obligar a Myanmar a romper las relaciones con la RPDC.
					
					Inicialmente, EE.UU. habia impuesto la ruptura de relaciones militares con la RPDC y despues, comenzo a demandar abiertamente la ruptura de todas las relaciones con ella tildandola de "amiga mala".
					
					En mayo pasado, el presidente estadounidense dijo que incrementaria la asistencia a Myanmar si acepta su demanda.
					
					La secretaria de Estado tambien aprovecho todas las ocasiones para pedir a Myanmar que se mueva en esa direccion.
					
					Hace poco, el asistente del secretario para Asia Oriental y el Pacifico del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. chismeo que Myanmar debe romper cuanto antes las relaciones con la RPDC que es "amiga mala".
					
					Esto muestra que no se ha cambiado en nada y sigue vigente en la practica la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU., encaminada a aislar y aplastar la primera.
					
					Por esa razon, la RPDC se prepara perfectamente desde hace mucho tiempo para hacer frente a esa politica. 
					
					El "amigo malo", con que no deben tratarse todos los paises aspirantes a la independencia, es precisamente EE.UU. que siembra cizanas entre los paises, naciones y tribus y vulnera la paz y estabilidad de la region y el mundo.
					
					En los paises del Medio Oriente, que sufren incontables desgracias y penas debido a la interferencia y agresion de EE.UU., se realizan sin parar las manifestaciones antiyanquis.
					
					Por culpa de EE.UU. que traslado su enfoque estrategico a Asia-Pacifico y fomenta la discordia y el enfrentamiento, se reportan en esta region tambien enconados litigios territoriales y la agravacion de tensiones.
					
					Los hechos ensenan la leccion de que suceden tragedias en todos los lugares donde interviene EE.UU.
					
					La RPDC esta garantizando la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana con su propio y poderoso disuasivo de guerra.
					
					Si EE.UU. sigue practicando su anacronica politica hostil a la RPDC, tendra el resultado tragico de ser expulsado de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia proyeccion de filmes anti-RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia proyeccion de filmes anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 28 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 28 la informacion no.1011  como  sigue:
					 En estos dias, la banda traidora surcoreana desarrolla con frenesi la demagogia para deshonrar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea incitando a los fugitivos al Sur de Corea, los recalcitrantes conservadores derechistas y los cineastas reaccionarios a fabricar y proyectar los filmes que tergiversan los derechos humanos de esta.
					
					 Bajo auspicio de la horda titere, la chusma de "Network por la democratizacion del Norte", entidad intrigante anti-RPDC organizo hace poco en Seul el "II festival internacional de cine de DDHH del Norte", en que proyecto 9 peliculas de grave insulta a la RPDC que tratan la supuesta "vida de fugitivos norcoreanos" y "estado real del campo de concentracion".
					
					  Por otra parte, la entidad intrigante de DDHH anti-RPDC, "Hombres que llevan al exito la unificacion" tambien organizo el dia 14 en el Comite de DDHH de la ONU en Ginebra de Suiza un "preestreno especial" de la pelicula "48M" producida por un fugitivo al Sur de Corea y libro una farsa de "testimonio" ante los embajadores, representantes y miembros de las organizaciones no gubernamentales de varios paises.
					
					  Para colmo, la horda titere intenta presentar tales filmes en el Congreso estadounidense y los paises europeos  y hasta en los festivales internacionales de cine en contubernio con los conspiradores de derechos humanos de EE.UU. y Europa.
					
					  Tales maniobras de la pandilla traidora titere devienen otra locura antinacional y anti-reunificacion tendente a calumniar la cada dia mas elevada dignidad de la RPDC e inculcar la conciencia conflictiva fratricida entre los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					  El secretariado del CRPP califica la farsa intrigante de la bada traidora titere de desafio atroz a nuestra dignidad y regimen y de locura maligna encaminada a eliminar el ambiente de la reunificacion pro-Norte de distintos estratos surcoreanos e inculcar la confrontacion fratricida y lo rechaza categoricamente.
					
					  Ahora en la RPDC bajo la sabia direccion del Comandante insigne sin par del Paektu, todo el ejercito y el pueblo, unidos firmemente, abren de par en par la era dorada de la prosperidad en que llevara una vida socialista en opulencia.
					
					  En el regazo afectuoso del Gran Hombre sin par quien produce nuevos episodios de amor al pueblo continuando la direccion abnegada sobre terreno para la patria y la nacion, todo el pueblo del pais, lleno  del deseo y conviccion, crea nuevos milagros e innovaciones en la construccion de un Estado prospero gozando a sus anchas de una vida autentica.
					
					 Sin embargo, la horda titere recurre obstinadamente a la absurda demagogia tendente a tergiversar la realidad de la RPDC incitando a las escorias humanas carentes de la conciencia elemental y honor y abusa hasta el arte cinematografica en el enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					  Tal locura histerica de la pandilla titere deviene la burla y el insulto al arte cinematografica, producto de la civilizacion contemporanea, que debe reflejar la justicia, la verdad y la noble vida del hombre.
					
					Igualmente, demuestra bien a que grado llega su fiebre conflictiva con la RPDC.
					
					 Son harinas del mismo costal los que traicionaron a su patria y pueblo abandonando la cuna de vida, que les ha criado, y a sus familiares, y los otros, que viven pegados a los primeros como parasitos, y las autoridades titeres surcoreanas que quieren alcanzar su objetivo criminal movilizando a esa chusma.
					
					  Nadie cree a ellas si bien estas se dedican a la tergiversacion para manchar la imagen de la RPDC y ganar asi los votos en las inminentes elecciones presidenciales.
					
					  Tal proceder revela la bajeza, la inmoralidad y la incultura de las autoridades surcoreanas que no tendran nada que ganar sino la maldicion de la opinion publica.
					
					  La RPDC no perdonara nunca a las autoridades titeres surcoreanas y los tipejos que al mandato de las primeras, producen y proyectan las peliculas que critican a la RPDC en el tema de DDHH, y los castigara implacablemente en nombre de toda la nacion.

articles.title: Resultado de calificacion del XIII Festival Internacional de Cine
articles.content:

					El premio de Fotografia: la pakistani "confesion de condenado a muerte".
					
					El premio de Actuacion del Artista: el protagonista de la pelicula alemana "Gran esperanza".
					
					El premio de Actuacion de la Artista: la protagonista de la rusa "La casa en viento".
					
					El premio de Bellas Artes: la china "Qian Xuesen".
					
					El de Musica: la francesa "Mujeres de sexto piso".
					
					El de Tecnologia: la china " Qian Xuesen".
					
					El premio de Direccion de la pelicula documental y de cortometraje: la filipina "Salto al agua".
					
					El premio de composicion: la suiza "Voz de pasion".

					El premio especial del Comite Internacional de Calificacion del Festival: la egipcia "Asmaa".

					El premio especial de proyeccion: la coreana "Deseo", la rusa "Tigre blanco", etc.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia alianza EE.UU.-Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia alianza EE.UU.-Japon
Pyongyang, 28 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico en su edicion de este viernes un articulo individual destacando que debido al fortalecimiento de la confabulacion politica y militar de Estados Unidos y Japon, perdura la tension en la Peninsula Coreana y no se mejora la situacion de la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					  En una reciente conferencia de prensa, el presidente estadounidense dijo que "la alianza EE.UU.-Japon es piedra angular para el aseguramiento de la paz y estabilidad de la region de Asia-Pacifico". Y el secretario de Defensa norteamericano senalo que "durante varios decenios la alianza EE.UU.-Japon sirvio de base de la paz y estabilidad de la region de Asia-Pacifico". 
					
					 Al mismo tiempo, el premier y otros gobernantes japoneses insisten en la necesidad de seguir manteniendo el "Tratado de Seguridad" EE.UU.-Japon para la "estabilidad" de la misma region. 
					
					  Tales palabras muestran la malsana intencion de los reaccionarios norteamericanos y japoneses de resistir y exterminar a las fuerzas progresistas en esta region y lograr su ambicion hegemonica y de nueva agresion. 
					
					  El fortalecimiento de la alianza EE.UU.-Japon significa el refuerzo de las fuerzas armadas agresoras. 
					
					  EE.UU. emplaza enormes fuerzas armadas en los importantes puntos estrategicos militares y las zonas con abundantes recursos naturales bajo el rotulo de la "estabilidad". 
					
					  El "Tratado de Seguridad" EE.UU.-Japon es para provocar la agresion y la guerra contra otros paises. 
					
					Ese tratado crea el peligro de guerra y amenaza la paz y la estabilidad de dicha region. 
					
					Su blanco principal es la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					EE.UU. y Japon presentan como la demanda primordial de la estrategia sobre Asia-Pacifico aplastar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tomando por trampolin el suelo surcoreano convertido en su base avanzada nuclear.
					
					En este contexto aumentan las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el Sur de Corea y lo convierten en el foco de guerra. 
					
					Mientras que continuan las maniobras criminales de los reaccionarios norteamericanos y japoneses, no se puede lograr la paz ni la estabilidad en la region de Asia-Pacifico.
